caller_intent: Christina Forni wants to update her insurance policy by adding a new vehicle (a Chevy Malibu with a different VIN) and inquire about the cost, coverage terms, and payment schedule.
resolution_steps: Maria verifies the new VIN number and confirms the vehicle details (Chevy Malibu, lower mileage).
Maria calculates the full-term premium for the new vehicle ($3,072.89 annually, ~$256/month).
Maria explains the total monthly cost including the existing policy (~$708/month).
Maria checks the client's payment history, confirms a past due amount was paid, and outlines the new payment schedule (down payment of $182, next installment $687).
Maria clarifies the monthly premium ($732/month for all vehicles) and acknowledges the client's request for total fees over ten months.
knowledge_required: Processing vehicle VIN updates in insurance policies
Calculating annual and monthly premiums based on vehicle details
Handling payment schedules and past due amounts
Explaining insurance coverage terms (full coverage, deductibles, rental/towing)
systems_referenced: Policy management database (for VIN verification and policy updates)
Billing/accounting system (for payment history and installment tracking)
summary: Christina Forni updates her insurance policy with a new Chevy Malibu, and Maria calculates the premium, explains the payment terms, and confirms the client's request for a detailed breakdown of fees over ten months. The call requires further clarification on total fees before finalizing the policy change.
